variable.name: gencons
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
Health/Medical/Biomedical with Methods (i.e. methodological research that will serve as a prelude to health or disease research is permitted) with IRB
Health/Medical/Biomedical with Non-Profit Use Only with Methods (i.e. methodological research that will serve as a prelude to health or disease research is permitted) with IRB
Disease Specific-Cardiovascular Disease with Methods (i.e. methodological research that will serve as a prelude to health or disease research is permitted) with IRB
Disease Specific-Cardiovascular Disease with Methods (i.e. methodological research that will serve as a prelude to health or disease research is permitted) with Non-Profit Use Only with IRB
